trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices" /> namespace contains the classes that are used by the <see href="http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5">Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)</see> command-line tool and the user code to convert metadata to and from XML schema for the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices" /> contém as classes que são usadas pela ferramenta de linha de comando <see href="http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5">Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)</see> e o código de usuário para converter metadados de e para esquema XML para a infraestrutura de comunicação remota.

trans-unit.source: Some of the most important classes of this namespace are the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink" /> class and the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Algumas das classes mais importantes desse namespace são a classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink" /> e a classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink> class is used by the remoting infrastructure to generate Web Services Description Language (WSDL) on the server side.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SdlChannelSink> pela infraestrutura de comunicação remota, a classe é usada para gerar WSDL Web Services Description Language () no lado do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> class provides the functionality of the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) command-line tool, and can be used programmatically to achieve the same outcome.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> classe fornece a funcionalidade do [Soapsuds ferramenta (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) de linha de comando ferramenta e pode ser usado por meio de programação para alcançar o mesmo resultado.

trans-unit.source: The methods of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> class can be used to create XML schemas that describe services that are exposed in source code, and to create C# code from XML schema.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> classe pode ser usada para criar esquemas XML que descrevem os serviços que são expostos no código-fonte e para criar o código c# do esquema XML.
